task.title: How to create your webdriver
task.shortdesc: In order to run your test on a certain browser you need to do some architecture work such as initiating the webdriver of the given browser you want

ol.li: Every browser has a different webdriver. If you want cross browser testing you need to initialize a webdriver for every browser

context.p: Here you will find out how to initilize a webdriver :

step.cmd: Create a separate class named Hooks and use [Binding] annotation
Initiate the webdriver in a method and use [BeforeScenario] annotation over the method

result.p: You will be able to run your test in the given browser
